## focus_2() function

Focus on a specific project or folder in OmniFocus. This matches the OmniFocus UI focus feature.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function focus(
  target: string,
  options?: {
    byId?: boolean | undefined;
  }
): Promise<CliOutput<FocusResult>>;
```
